anime.description: A short horror anime that presents classic urban legends in a digitized form of the recently rare "kamishibai" style. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: horror
tag.description: The horror cinematic genre is characterized by the attempt to make the viewer experience dread, fear, terror, or horror. Often their plots involve the intrusion of an evil force, event or personage, sometimes of supernatural origin, on the mundane world and the consequences thereof.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 赤いハイヒール
Red High Heel
Le talon rouge
Kırmızı Yüksek Topuklu Ayakkabı
Akai High Heel
episode.summary: A salaryman has missed the last train after working overtime. He tries to hail a taxi some distance from the train station, but is unable to catch one. As he`s wondering what he should do, he spots a vacant taxi racing along an empty street at high speed and finally manages to catch a ride, but then... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裁ち鋏
Sewing Shears
Les ciseaux de tailleur
Dikiş Makası
Tachibasami
episode.summary: A young woman in college has moved into a certain old apartment building. As she`s unpacking her belongings, she sees a spot on the wooden floor where a mismatched board has been added. Curious, she lifts the board to find a dirt surface with a pair of rusty scissors stuck in the earth... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 水槽
Fish Tank
L`aquarium
Akvaryum
Suisou
episode.summary: A boy in middle school learns of a creepy old house near his school. He decides to check it out and, once inside, discovers a large fish tank in one room. Curious to know what`s in it, he cautiously peers through the glass... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 舌
Tongue
La langue
Dil
Shita
episode.summary: A salaryman on his way home from work spots a cat lying lifelessly in the road after being hit by a car. He carries it to the sidewalk, but it`s clearly beyond help, so he makes a grave for it and heads home. That night, while relaxing at home, he hears what sounds like a kitten`s cry... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誰だ
Guess Who?
Qui est-ce ?
Bil Bakalım Kim?
Dare Da
episode.summary: A high school student is visiting an amusement park with an older member of her club, whom she has a crush on. She`s thrilled at the prospect of going on this date with the senpai she admires. But on the way home, they see a creepy woman on the train platform, and from that point onward, the girl`s head is overtaken by a frightening suspicion... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夜行バス
Night Bus
Le bus de nuit
Akşam Otobüsü
Yakou Bus
episode.summary: A group of college students sets off on a night bus to go on vacation. On the way, one of them develops a stomachache and asks the driver to stop at a service area along the highway. But when he returns from the bathroom, the atmosphere inside the bus is very different... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カセットテープ
Cassette Tape
La cassette
Kaset
Cassette Tape
episode.summary: A man has returned to his hometown to attend the wedding of a friend from elemntary school. To please his family, he arrives a day early to stay at his parents` home the night before. As he`s marveling at how his childhood bedroom hasn`t changed at all, he discovers a cassette tape in a desk drawer labeled "What Happened Today" and decides to listen to it... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 靴音
Footsteps
Les bruits de pas
Ayak Sesleri
Kutsuoto
episode.summary: A husband, after finally receiving some time off, accompanies his wife on a shopping trip. Along the way, he receives an invitation from a friend to go out for drinks. To avoid upsetting his wife, he replies to his friend in a bathroom stall, but then he notices some creepy writing on the wall... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かまくら
Snow Hut
L`igloo de neige
Kardan Kulübe
Kamakura
episode.summary: A boy in elementary school has been brought to the snowy country by his parents to visit his grandparents over winter break. He doesn`t often see snow, so he`s overjoyed to have snowball fights and build snow huts with his cousin. Then, in a grove of trees, they find a snow hut with no entrance... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白線
White Line
La ligne blanche
Beyaz Şerit
Hakusen
episode.summary: A new teacher is staying after school grading tests for her class. When she glances out the window, she sees a student in an unfamiliar, old-looking school uniform, laying white powder lines in the schoolyard. The teacher steps outside to issue a warning, but the student is gone, and the white line continues into the school building. So she follows it inside to find the student... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇・招び鶴
Calling Crane
L`appel de la grue
Seslenen Turna
Yami Yobi Tsuru
episode.summary: Some middle school girls are staying over at a classmate`s house. At school that day, the girls had agreed to perform a ritual at the sleepover that they believe will let them speak to the dead. They`re having a great time as they begin the ritual, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 歯ぎしり
Grinding Teeth
Grincements de dents
Gıcırdatan Dişler
Hagishiri
episode.summary: An office lady uses some of her paid leave to go on a trip with her coworkers, but during the trip, she develops a toothache. Hoping to get it fixed even though she`s on vacation, she visits a local, old-looking dental clinic. The dentist takes one look at her tooth and shoves pliers into her mouth to pull it without asking for her approval... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地下道
Underground Walkway
Le tunnel souterrain
Yer Altı Geçidi
Chikadou
episode.summary: A college student is caught in a sudden rainfall on the way home from a night out drinking. He attempts to take shelter until the rain stops, but discovers an underground path to the train station and heads down it. A bit ahead of him in the dark, empty passage, he spots a man in what looks like a construction worker`s uniform, who tries to lead him down a side path that leads away from the station... Source: crunchyroll
